description: This table contains information about treatment plan conversion sessions.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONVSESS_FROM_DAY
columns.description: The line in Treatment Day ID (I TPL 5000) of the first day in this conversion session.

columns.name: CONVSESS_TO_DAY
columns.description: The line in  Treatment Day ID (I TPL 5000) of the day after the last day in this session. This can be blank if the session includes the last day in the plan.

columns.name: CONVSESS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of a conversion session for this plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


Discarded


Started


Active - Step 1


Active - Step 2

columns.name: CONVSESS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of a conversion session for a plan, whether inpatient or outpatient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient


Outpatient

columns.name: CONVSESS_ACT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this conversion session action was done.

columns.name: CONVSESS_ACT_USR_ID
columns.description: The user who took this conversion session action.
